member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.GaussianBlurEffect.BlurAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of blur to be applied to the image.

remarks.p: You can compute the blur radius of the kernel by multiplying the standard deviation by 3. The units of both the standard deviation and blur radius are DIPs. A value of zero DIPs disables this effect entirely.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.GaussianBlurEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Gaussian blur effect.

remarks.p: Source can be any IEffectInput object. But source have to be type if output will be drawn using . Any valid effect can be used as source to create effects chain.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1GaussianBlur GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.
